conflicting_values: Calculated cashback value converted to standard currency based on redemption type: coins divided by 166.67, goldcoins divided by 100, UPI amount plus 0.2478, otherwise original amount
Calculated cash equivalent value based on redemption type: coins (amount/166.67), goldcoins (amount/100), UPI (amount+0.2478), or original amount for other types
UPI SuperCash campaign identifier grouping transactions by specific promotional campaigns
Marketing campaign identifier associated with SuperCash offers and promotions

definitions.resolution_approach: Used proper case 'Status' as standard capitalization
